alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 2:51AM AKDT until March 15 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Upper Lynn Canal including Haines and Skagway. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Plan on slippery roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest amounts are expected south of Haines on the Chilkat Peninsula. Snow will be light at first on Monday, but then increase Monday evening and overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
